prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a regal penguin with an icy crown.
Show me a Pokemon with a sleek body and a majestic presence, perfect for battles.
Imagine a Pokemon that combines elements of the ocean and royalty, with a powerful stance.
Generate a powerful water-type Pokemon that commands respect with its steel-like features.
Design a Pokemon that stands tall and proud, embodying the essence of the sea.
Give me a unique Pokemon with a royal blue color palette and striking facial features.
Make a Pokemon that looks both elegant and strong, ready to take on any challenge.
